article:
Dear Xiao Ling,
I'm an English girl. My name is Gina White. I am twelve. I have two brothers, Tom and Tony. We are students, and we go to school five days a week .My parents are teachers. They say China is great, and Chinese people are very friendly. I want to travel  in China. I think it is great fun. I like Chinese history   books a lot because I think they are very interesting. My brothers and I like playing soccer and volleyball. What about you?
Yours,
Gina
